history.proof: unfold current_term_gt_zero. intros h H4. apply Decidable.dec_not_not. - simpl in *. hauto lq: on depth: 3. - hauto lq: on depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros xs p ys net st' ps' d m t es res H H0 H1 H2 H3.

exceptions.exn: The reference net was not found in the current environment.
The reference H2 was not found in the current environment.
The reference p was not found in the current environment.
The reference H3 was not found in the current environment.

original: intros xs p ys net st' ps' d m t es res H H0 H1 H2 H3. unfold current_term_gt_zero. intros h H4. apply current_term_gt_zero_invariant with net. - apply H2. - destruct (name_eq_dec h (pDst p)). ++ subst. rewrite H3 in *. simpl in *. destruct (handleAppendEntriesReply _ _ _ _ _ _) eqn:H5. injection H as [= -> ->]. unfold update. destruct (name_eq_dec (pDst p) (pDst p)) as [_|Hn]. * auto. * contradiction. ++ rewrite H3 in *. simpl in *. unfold update. destruct (name_eq_dec (pDst p) h) as [_|?]. * congruence. * apply H4.
